sentences.sentence: Well, I recognize you; do you remember, Brevet?
sentences.translation: 好吧，我认识你们，我！ 布莱卫！

sentences.sentence: It all depends on what you believe, said film reviewer Brad Brevet.
sentences.translation: 这一切都取决于你相信，电影评论家说，布拉德·布雷维特。

sentences.sentence: The ex-convict Brevet wore the black and gray waistcoat of the central prisons.
sentences.translation: 老犯人布莱卫穿件中央监狱的灰黑色褂子。
